summary.span: 代表資料的記憶體中快取。

span.span: Represents an in-memory cache of data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ，這就是資料來源擷取資料的記憶體中快取是 ADO.NET 架構的主要元件。The , which is an in-memory cache of data retrieved from a data source, is a major component of the ADO.NET architecture. 組成的集合物件，您可以相互關聯與物件。The consists of a collection of objects that you can relate to each other with objects. 您也可以強制執行中的資料完整性利用和物件。You can also enforce data integrity in the by using the and objects. 如需有關使用的詳細資訊物件，請參閱[Dataset、 Datatable 和 Dataview](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md)。For further details about working with objects, see [DataSets, DataTables, and DataViews](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/index.md). 然而物件包含的資料，可讓您透過瀏覽階層的資料表。Whereas objects contain the data, the allows you to navigate though the table hierarchy. 中所包含的資料表經由屬性。The tables are contained in a accessed through the property. 當存取物件，請注意，這些有條件地區分大小寫。When accessing objects, note that they are conditionally case sensitive. 例如，如果一個名為"mydatatable"和另一個名為"Mydatatable 」，用來搜尋的其中一個資料表的字串會視為區分大小寫。For example, if one is named "mydatatable" and another is named "Mydatatable", a string used to search for one of the tables is regarded as case sensitive. 不過，如果"mydatatable 」 存在，而且 「 Mydatatable"並不會搜尋字串會視為為不區分大小寫。However, if "mydatatable" exists and "Mydatatable" does not, the search string is regarded as case insensitive. 如需使用詳細資訊物件，請參閱[建立 DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable.md)。For more information about working with objects, see [Creating a DataTable](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable.md). A可以讀取和寫入資料和結構描述為 XML 文件。A can read and write data and schema as XML documents. 資料和結構描述然後會透過 HTTP 傳輸並啟用 XML 的任何平台上的任何應用程式，使用。The data and schema can then be transported across HTTP and used by any application, on any platform that is XML-enabled. 您可以使用的 XML 結構描述儲存結構描述方法，，和結構描述和資料可以儲存使用方法。You can save the schema as an XML schema with the method, and both schema and data can be saved using the method. 若要讀取 XML 文件包含結構描述和資料，使用方法。To read an XML document that includes both schema and data, use the method. 在典型的多層式實作，可建立及重新整理步驟，而且會更新原始資料的：In a typical multiple-tier implementation, the steps for creating and refreshing a , and in turn, updating the original data are to: 1. 建置並填滿每中從資料來源使用的資料與。Build and fill each in a with data from a data source using a . 2. 變更中個別的資料藉由新增、 更新或刪除的物件物件。Change the data in individual objects by adding, updating, or deleting objects. 3. 叫用方法用來建立第二個該功能的資料變更。Invoke the method to create a second that features only the changes to the data. 4. 呼叫方法，將第二個做為引數。Call the method of the , passing the second as an argument. 5. 叫用方法來合併的變更，從第二個到第一個。Invoke the method to merge the changes from the second into the first. 6. 叫用上。Invoke the on the . 或者，叫用取消所做的變更。Alternatively, invoke to cancel the changes. > [!NOTE] > 並物件會繼承自，並支援針對遠端執行功能的介面。The and objects inherit from , and support the interface for remoting. 這些是唯一可以進行遠端通訊的 ADO.NET 物件。These are the only ADO.NET objects that can be remoted. > [!NOTE] > 類別繼承自不會完成記憶體回收行程，因為完成項已隱藏在。Classes inherited from are not finalized by the garbage collector, because the finalizer has been suppressed in . 在衍生的類別可以呼叫其建構函式，以允許記憶體回收行程完成類別中的方法。The derived class can call the method in its constructor to allow the class to be finalized by the garbage collector. ## Examples 下列範例包含數種方法結合，建立並填入從**Northwind**資料庫。The following example consists of several methods that, combined, create and fill a from the **Northwind** database. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataSet Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void AcceptChanges() cil managed

summary.span: 認可從載入這個 物件或前一次呼叫 以來，對該物件做的所有變更。

span.span: Commits all the changes made to this since it was loaded or since the last time was called.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 同時並類別都有方法。Both the and classes have methods. 呼叫位於層級的原因方法，每個呼叫。Calling at the level causes the method for each to be called. 同樣地，叫用上會導致上的每個資料表呼叫。Similarly, invoking on the causes to be called on each table within the . 如此一來，在中，您必須在可以叫用方法的多個層級。In this manner, you have multiple levels at which the method can be invoked. 呼叫的可讓您叫用所有從屬物件 （例如，資料表和資料列） 與某個呼叫方法。Calling the of the enables you to invoke the method on all subordinate objects (for example, tables and rows) with one call. 當您呼叫`AcceptChanges`上`DataSet`，任何仍處於編輯模式的物件已成功結束其編輯。When you call `AcceptChanges` on the `DataSet`, any objects still in edit-mode end their edits successfully. 每個屬性也會變更;`Added`並`Modified`資料列會變成`Unchanged`，和`Deleted`移除的資料列。The property of each also changes; `Added` and `Modified` rows become `Unchanged`, and `Deleted` rows are removed. 如果`DataSet`包含物件，叫用`AcceptChanges`方法也會導致強制執行。If the `DataSet` contains objects, invoking the `AcceptChanges` method also causes the to be enforced. > [!NOTE] > `AcceptChanges` 並`RejectChanges`只會套用到`DataRow`相關的變更 （也就是 Add、 Remove、 刪除和修改）。`AcceptChanges` and `RejectChanges` only apply to `DataRow` related changes (that is, Add, Remove, Delete, and Modify). 它們並不適用於結構描述或結構的變更。They are not applicable to schema or structural changes. > > 呼叫 AcceptChanges 不會複寫這些變更回資料來源如果使用 DataAdapter 填入資料集。Calling AcceptChanges will not replicate these changes back to the data source if the DataSet was filled using a DataAdapter. 在此情況下，呼叫改。In that situation, call instead. 請參閱[使用 Dataadapter 更新資料來源](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md)如需詳細資訊。See [Updating Data Sources with DataAdapters](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/updating-data-sources-with-dataadapters.md) for more information. ## Examples 下列範例會將要在。The following example adds a to a in a . 上，然後呼叫方法，哪一個串聯，聯集全部它所包含的物件。The method is then called on the , which cascades to all objects that it contains. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataSet.AcceptChanges#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.AcceptChanges/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataSet.AcceptChanges#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.AcceptChanges/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立新，其中包含一份原始中的所有資料列具有暫止的變更。Creates a new that contains a copy of all rows in the original that have pending changes. 關聯性條件約束可能會導致其他未變更的資料列加入至新如果未變更的資料列包含主索引鍵對應至已變更的資料列中的外部索引鍵。Relationship constraints can cause additional unchanged rows to be added to the new if the unchanged rows contain primary keys corresponding to foreign keys in the changed rows. 此方法會傳回`null`有任何資料列中原始具有暫止的變更。The method returns `null` if there are no rows in the original that have pending changes. ## Examples 下列範例會建立簡單一個資料表、 兩個資料行，與 10 個資料列。The following example creates a simple with one table, two columns, and ten rows. 兩個值會變更，並加入一個資料列。Two values are changed, and one row is added. 使用建立的已變更的資料子集方法。A subset of the changed data is created using the method. 之後重新調整錯誤，變更結構描述的子集，加入新的資料行。After reconciling errors, a new column is added to the subset, changing the schema. 當方法呼叫`missingSchemaAction`設為`MissingSchemaAction.Add`，新的資料行加入原始物件的結構描述。When the method is called with the `missingSchemaAction` set to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`, the new column is added to the original object's schema. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一種技術來填滿單一從擷取的資料執行個體。The method provides a technique for filling a single with data, retrieved from an instance. 這個方法會提供相同的功能，但可讓您從多個結果集載入`IDataReader`成多個資料表內`DataSet`。This method provides the same functionality, but allows you to load multiple result sets from an `IDataReader` into multiple tables within a `DataSet`. 如果 `DataSet` 已經包含資料列，從資料來源傳入的資料會與現有的資料列合併。If the `DataSet` already contains rows, the incoming data from the data source is merged with the existing rows. `Load`方法可用於數個常見的案例，從指定的資料來源取得資料，並將它加入至目前的資料容器所有為中心 (在此情況下， `DataSet`)。The `Load` method can be used in several common scenarios, all centered around getting data from a specified data source and adding it to the current data container (in this case, a `DataSet`). 下列案例說明標準用法`DataSet`、 描述其更新，並合併行為。These scenarios describe standard usage for a `DataSet`, describing its update and merge behavior. A`DataSet`會同步處理，或更新具有單一主要資料來源。A `DataSet` synchronizes or updates with a single primary data source. `DataSet`追蹤變更，允許與主要資料來源的同步處理。The `DataSet` tracks changes, allowing synchronization with the primary data source. 颾魤 ㄛ`DataSet`可以接受一或多個次要資料來源的增量資料。In addition, a `DataSet` can accept incremental data from one or more secondary data sources. `DataSet`不負任何責任，若要允許與次要資料來源的同步處理追蹤變更。The `DataSet` isn't responsible for tracking changes in order to allow synchronization with the secondary data source. 根據這些兩個的假設性的資料來源，使用者很可能需要下列其中一個下列行為：Given these two hypothetical data sources, a user is likely to require one of the following behaviors: - 初始化`DataSet`從主要資料來源。Initialize `DataSet` from a primary data source. 在此案例中，使用者想要初始化空`DataSet`以主要資料來源的值。In this scenario, the user wants to initialize an empty `DataSet` with values from the primary data source. 會修改一或多個 DataTable 的內容。One or more DataTable's contents are modified. 稍後，使用者想要將變更傳播回主要資料來源。Later the user intends to propagate changes back to the primary data source. - 保留變更，並重新同步處理主要資料來源。Preserve changes and re-synchronize from the primary data source. 在此案例中，使用者想要採取`DataSet`填入先前案例中，並執行增量同步處理與主要資料來源，保留在中所做的修改`DataSet`。In this scenario, the user wants to take the `DataSet` filled in the previous scenario and perform an incremental synchronization with the primary data source, preserving modifications made in the `DataSet`. - 累加的資料摘要，從次要資料來源。Incremental data feed from secondary data sources. 在此案例中，使用者想要合併從一或多個次要資料來源的變更並傳播這些變更回復到主要資料來源。In this scenario, the user wants to merge changes from one or more secondary data sources, and propagate those changes back to the primary data source. `Load`方法會進行所有這些情況下可能。The `Load` method makes all these scenarios possible. 這個方法可讓您指定的載入選項參數，指出如何已經在資料列結合所載入的資料列。This method allows you to specify a load option parameter, indicating how rows already in a combine with rows being loaded. 下表描述所提供的三種載入選項列舉型別。The following table describes the three load options provided by the enumeration. 在每個案例中，描述當內送資料中的資料列的主索引鍵符合現有的資料列的主索引鍵表示的行為。In each case, the description indicates the behavior when the primary key of a row in the incoming data matches the primary key of an existing row. |載入選項Load Option|描述Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`PreserveChanges` (預設)`PreserveChanges` (default)|使用內送資料列的值更新資料列的原始版本。Updates the original version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`OverwriteChanges`|傳入的資料列的值更新資料列的目前和原始版本。Updates the current and original versions of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`Upsert`|使用內送資料列的值來更新資料列的目前版本。Updates the current version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| 一般情況下，`PreserveChanges`並`OverwriteChanges`選項適用的案例中，使用者必須同步處理`DataSet`和其與主要資料來源的變更。In general, the `PreserveChanges` and `OverwriteChanges` options are intended for scenarios in which the user needs to synchronize the `DataSet` and its changes with the primary data source. `Upsert`選項有助於從一或多個次要資料來源的彙總變更。The `Upsert` option facilitates aggregating changes from one or more secondary data sources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一種技術來填滿單一從擷取的資料執行個體。The method provides a technique for filling a single with data, retrieved from an instance. 這個方法會提供相同的功能，但可讓您從多個結果集載入成多個資料表內。This method provides the same functionality, but allows you to load multiple result sets from an into multiple tables within a . > [!NOTE] > 載入作業會失敗如果有任何來源資料行，在傳入`reader`是計算資料行。The load operation will fail with an if any of the source data columns in the incoming `reader` are computed columns. `loadOption`參數可讓您指定要匯入的資料與現有資料互動，及可以是任何一個值的方式列舉型別。The `loadOption` parameter allows you to specify how you want the imported data to interact with existing data, and can be any of the values from the enumeration. 請參閱文件如需有關使用此參數的方法。See the documentation for the method for more information on using this parameter. `tables`參數可讓您指定的陣列執行個體，表示對應至每一個結果集從讀取器的 載入資料表的順序。The `tables` parameter allows you to specify an array of instances, indicating the order of the tables corresponding to each result set loaded from the reader. 方法會填滿每個提供包含來自單一結果集，從來源資料讀取器的執行個體。The method fills each supplied instance with data from a single result set from the source data reader. 每個結果集之後,方法移至下一個設定的讀取器中，直到有沒有更多的結果集的結果。After each result set, the method moves on to the next result set within the reader, until there are no more result sets. 這個方法的名稱解析配置等同於，後面接著方法的類別。The name resolution scheme for this method is the same as that followed by the method of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會建立新，加入兩個執行個體，然後填滿使用方法，擷取資料，從包含兩個結果集。The following example creates a new , adds two instances to the , and then fills the using the method, retrieving data from a that contains two result sets. 最後，這個範例會顯示在主控台視窗中資料表的內容。Finally, the example displays the contents of the tables in the console window. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一種技術來填滿單一從擷取的資料執行個體。The method provides a technique for filling a single with data, retrieved from an instance. 這個方法會提供相同的功能，但可讓您從多個結果集載入`IDataReader`成多個資料表內`DataSet`。This method provides the same functionality, but allows you to load multiple result sets from an `IDataReader` into multiple tables within a `DataSet`. > [!NOTE] > 載入作業會失敗如果有任何來源資料行，在傳入`reader`是計算資料行。The load operation will fail with an if any of the source data columns in the incoming `reader` are computed columns. `loadOption`參數可讓您指定要匯入的資料與現有資料互動，及可以是任何一個值的方式列舉型別。The `loadOption` parameter allows you to specify how you want the imported data to interact with existing data, and can be any of the values from the enumeration. 請參閱文件如需有關使用此參數的方法。See the documentation for the method for more information on using this parameter. `tables`參數可讓您指定資料表名稱，表示對應至每一個結果集從讀取器的 載入的資料表順序的陣列。The `tables` parameter allows you to specify an array of table names, indicating the order of the tables corresponding to each result set loaded from the reader. `Load`方法會嘗試尋找的資料表內`DataSet`陣列中的資料表名稱，在順序中找到符合的名稱。The `Load` method attempts to find a table within the `DataSet` matching the name found in the array of table names, in order. 如果找到相符的資料表，則該資料表會載入目前的結果集的內容。If a matching table is found, that table is loaded with the content of the current result set. 如果找到相符的資料表，資料表名稱的陣列中提供的名稱建立資料表，並從結果集中會推斷新的資料表結構描述。If no matching table is found, a table is created using the name supplied in the array of table names, and the new table's schema is inferred from the result set. 每個結果集之後,`Load`方法移至下一個設定的讀取器中，直到有沒有更多的結果集的結果。After each result set, the `Load` method moves on to the next result set within the reader, until there are no more result sets. 與相關聯的預設命名空間`DataSet`，如果任何項目，是新建立的每個相關聯`DataTable`。The default namespace associated with `DataSet`, if any, is associated with each newly created `DataTable`. 這個方法的名稱解析配置等同於，後面接著方法的類別。The name resolution scheme for this method is the same as that followed by the method of the class. ## Examples 下列主控台應用程式範例首先會建立資料表，並將資料載入至讀取器從，並使用`Load`方法。The following Console application example first creates tables and loads data from a reader into a , using the `Load` method. 範例接著會新增至資料表，並嘗試使用的資料填入資料表。The example then adds tables to a and attempts to fill the tables with data from a . 在此範例中，因為參數傳遞給`Load`方法表示資料表名稱不存在，`Load`方法會建立新的資料表，以符合做為參數傳遞的名稱。In this example, because the parameters passed to the `Load` method indicate a table name that does not exist, the `Load` method creates a new table to match the name passed as a parameter. 將資料載入之後，這個範例會顯示在主控台視窗及其所有資料表的內容。Once the data has been loaded, the example displays the contents of all its tables in the Console window. summary.span: 使用所提供的 ，以資料來源的值，填入 ，使用 執行個體的陣列，以提供結構描述和命名空間資訊。

span.span: Fills a with values from a data source using the supplied , using an array of instances to supply the schema and namespace information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一種技術來填滿單一從擷取的資料執行個體。The method provides a technique for filling a single with data, retrieved from an instance. 這個方法會提供相同的功能，但可讓您從多個結果集載入成多個資料表內。This method provides the same functionality, but allows you to load multiple result sets from an into multiple tables within a . > [!NOTE] > 載入作業會失敗如果有任何來源資料行，在傳入`reader`是計算資料行。The load operation will fail with an if any of the source data columns in the incoming `reader` are computed columns. `loadOption`參數可讓您指定要匯入的資料與現有資料互動，及可以是任何一個值的方式列舉型別。The `loadOption` parameter allows you to specify how you want the imported data to interact with existing data, and can be any of the values from the enumeration. 請參閱文件如需有關使用此參數的方法。See the documentation for the method for more information on using this parameter. `errorHandler`參數是指的在載入資料時，發生錯誤時所呼叫的程序的委派。The `errorHandler` parameter is a delegate that refers to a procedure that is called when an error occurs while loading data. 傳遞至程序的參數提供屬性，可讓您擷取資訊所發生的錯誤，目前的資料列的資料，而被填入。The parameter passed to the procedure provides properties that allow you to retrieve information about the error that occurred, the current row of data, and the being filled. 使用此委派的機制，而不是更簡單的 try/catch 區塊，可讓您判斷錯誤處理狀況，並繼續處理，如果您想。Using this delegate mechanism, rather than a simpler try/catch block, allows you to determine the error, handle the situation, and continue processing if you like. 參數提供屬性： 將此屬性設定為`true`表示處理錯誤和想来繼續處理，將屬性設定為`false`來代表您想要停止處理。The parameter supplies a property: set this property to `true` to indicate that you have handled the error and wish to continue processing; set the property to `false` to indicate that you wish to halt processing. 請注意，將屬性設定為`false`造成觸發要擲回例外狀況的問題程式碼。Be aware that setting the property to `false` causes the code that triggered the problem to throw an exception. `tables`參數可讓您指定的陣列執行個體，表示對應至每一個結果集從讀取器的 載入資料表的順序。The `tables` parameter allows you to specify an array of instances, indicating the order of the tables corresponding to each result set loaded from the reader. 方法會填滿每個提供包含來自單一結果集，從來源資料讀取器的執行個體。The method fills each supplied instance with data from a single result set from the source data reader. 每個結果集之後,方法移至下一個設定的讀取器中，直到有沒有更多的結果集的結果。After each result set, the method moves on to the next result set within the reader, until there are no more result sets. 這個方法的名稱解析配置等同於，後面接著方法的類別。The name resolution scheme for this method is the same as that followed by the method of the class. ## Examples 下列範例會加入至資料表，然後嘗試使用方法來載入資料，其中包含不相容的結構描述。The following example adds a table to a , and then attempts to use the method to load data from a that contains an incompatible schema. 而不是捕捉此錯誤，此範例會使用調查和處理錯誤的委派。Rather than trapping the error, this example uses a delegate to investigate and handle the error. 輸出會顯示在主控台視窗。The output is displayed in the console window. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataSet.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataSet.Load/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataSet.Load#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataSet.Load/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Merge(class System.Data.DataRow[] rows) cil managed

param.name: rows
param.span: 物件的陣列，將合併至 。

span.span: The array of objects to be merged into the .

summary.span: 將 物件的陣列合併到目前的 中。

span.span: Merges an array of objects into the current .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來合併兩個有大致相似的結構描述的物件。The method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 合併用戶端應用程式上通常用來將資料來源的最新的變更合併到現有。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 這可讓用戶端應用程式已重新整理從資料來源的最新的資料。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. 結尾的一系列包含驗證變更、 錯誤，重新調整、 更新資料來源的變更，以及最後重新整理現有的程序通常會呼叫方法。The method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing . 用戶端應用程式中，它會有單一按鈕，讓使用者可以按一下，收集變更的資料，並驗證它再將它傳送回中介層元件。In a client application, it is common to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle-tier component. 在此案例中，第一次叫用方法。In this scenario, the method is first invoked. 方法會傳回第二個適合用來驗證和合併。That method returns a second optimized for validating and merging. 此第二個物件只包含並物件的已變更，導致原始的子集。This second object contains only the and objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original . 這個子集通常比較小，因此更有效率地傳遞回中介層元件。This subset is generally smaller and thus more efficiently passed back to a middle-tier component. 然後中, 介層元件會透過預存程序，以變更更新原始資料來源。The middle-tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures. 中介層就可以傳送回其中一個新（藉由執行原始查詢一次），包含原始資料和資料來源的最新的資料，或它可以傳回的任何變更，已對它從資料來源子集。The middle tier can then send back either a new that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source. （例如，如果資料來源會自動建立唯一的主索引鍵值，這些值可以傳播回用戶端應用程式。）在任一情況下，傳回可以合併至用戶端應用程式的原始與方法。(For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 當呼叫方法時，兩個結構描述物件進行比較，因為它是可能的結構描述可能已變更。When the method is called, the schemas of the two objects are compared because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed. 比方說，在企業對企業案例中，新的資料行可能有已加入 XML 結構描述由自動化程序。For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process. 如果來源包含結構描述項目 (新增物件)，在目標中遺漏，結構描述項目可以藉由設定新增到目標`missingSchemaAction`引數`MissingSchemaAction.Add`。If the source contains schema elements (added objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. 在此情況下，合併包含加入的結構描述和資料。In that case, the merged contains the added schema and data. 合併的結構描述之後, 便會合併資料。After merging schemas, the data is merged. 合併新的來源時到目標，任何來源的資料列與的值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`與進行比對具有相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 來源的資料列的值`Added`就會對應到新的來源資料列的相同主索引鍵值的新目標資料列。Source rows with a value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. 合併期間，會停用條件約束。During a merge, constraints are disabled. 如果任何條件約束無法啟用合併，結尾產生，停用條件約束時，合併的資料都會保留下來。If any constraints cannot be enabled at the end of a merge, a is generated and the merged data is retained while the constraints are disabled. 在此情況下，屬性設定為`false`，和所有資料列，而不會標示為錯誤。In this case, the property is set to `false`, and all rows that are invalid are marked in error. 必須先解決錯誤，然後再嘗試重設屬性設`true`。The errors must be resolved before attempting to reset the property to `true`.

In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 當呼叫方法時，兩個結構描述物件進行比較，因為它是可能的結構描述可能已變更。When the method is called, the schemas of the two objects are compared because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed. 比方說，在企業對企業案例中，新的資料行可能有已加入 XML 結構描述由自動化程序。For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process. 如果來源包含結構描述項目 (新增物件)，在目標中遺漏，結構描述項目可以藉由設定新增到目標`missingSchemaAction`引數`MissingSchemaAction.Add`。If the source contains schema elements (added objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. 在此情況下，合併包含加入的結構描述和資料。In that case, the merged contains the added schema and data. 合併的結構描述之後, 便會合併資料。After merging schemas, the data is merged. 合併新的來源時到目標，任何來源的資料列與的值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`與進行比對具有相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 來源的資料列`DataRowState`的值`Added`就會對應到新的來源資料列的相同主索引鍵值的新目標資料列。Source rows with a `DataRowState` value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. 合併期間，會停用條件約束。During a merge, constraints are disabled. 如果任何條件約束無法啟用合併，結尾產生，停用條件約束時，合併的資料都會保留下來。If any constraints cannot be enabled at the end of merge, a is generated and the merged data is retained while the constraints are disabled. 在此情況下，屬性設定為`false`，和所有資料列，而不會標示為錯誤。In this case, the property is set to `false`, and all rows that are invalid are marked in error. 必須先解決錯誤，然後再嘗試重設屬性設`true`。The errors must be resolved before attempting to reset the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會使用，更新，並上的方法。The following example uses the , Update, and methods on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法用來合併兩個有大致相似的結構描述的物件。The method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 合併用戶端應用程式上通常用來將資料來源的最新的變更合併到現有。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 這可讓用戶端應用程式已重新整理從資料來源的最新的資料。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. 結尾的一系列包含驗證變更、 錯誤，重新調整、 更新資料來源的變更，以及最後重新整理現有的程序通常會呼叫方法。The method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing . 用戶端應用程式中，它會有單一按鈕，讓使用者可以按一下，收集變更的資料，並驗證它再將它傳送回中介層元件。In a client application, it is common to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle-tier component. 在此案例中，第一次叫用方法。In this scenario, the method is first invoked. 方法會傳回第二個適合用來驗證和合併。That method returns a second optimized for validating and merging. 此第二個物件只包含並物件的已變更，導致原始的子集。This second object contains only the and objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original . 這個子集是通常較小，並因此更有效率地傳回給中介層元件。This subset is generally smaller, and thus more efficiently passed back to a middle-tier component. 然後中, 介層元件會透過預存程序，以變更更新原始資料來源。The middle-tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures. 中介層就可以傳送回其中一個新（藉由執行原始查詢一次），包含原始資料和資料來源的最新的資料，或它可以傳回的任何變更，已對它從資料來源子集。The middle tier can then send back either a new that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source. （例如，如果資料來源會自動建立唯一的主索引鍵值，這些值可以傳播回用戶端應用程式。）在任一情況下，傳回可以合併至用戶端應用程式的原始與方法。(For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 當呼叫方法時，兩個結構描述物件進行比較，因為它是可能的結構描述可能已變更。When the method is called, the schemas of the two objects are compared because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed. 比方說，在企業對企業案例中，新的資料行可能有已加入 XML 結構描述由自動化程序。For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process. 如果來源包含結構描述項目 (新增物件)，在目標中遺漏，結構描述項目可以藉由設定新增到目標`missingSchemaAction`引數`MissingSchemaAction.Add`。If the source contains schema elements (added objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. 在此情況下，合併包含加入的結構描述和資料。In that case, the merged contains the added schema and data. 合併的結構描述之後, 便會合併資料。After merging schemas, the data is merged. 合併新的來源時到目標，任何來源的資料列與的值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`與進行比對具有相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 來源的資料列`DataRowState`的值`Added`就會對應到新的來源資料列的相同主索引鍵值的新目標資料列。Source rows with a `DataRowState` value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. 合併期間，會停用條件約束。During a merge, constraints are disabled. 如果任何條件約束無法啟用合併，結尾產生，停用條件約束時，合併的資料都會保留下來。If any constraints cannot be enabled at the end of merge, a is generated and the merged data is retained while the constraints are disabled. 在此情況下，屬性設定為`false`，和所有資料列，而不會標示為錯誤。In this case, the property is set to `false`, and all rows that are invalid are marked in error. 必須先解決錯誤，然後再嘗試重設屬性設`true`。The errors must be resolved before attempting to reset the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立簡單一個資料表、 兩個資料行，與 10 個資料列。The following example creates a simple with one table, two columns, and ten rows. 第二個也就是建立與第一個。A second is created that is identical to the first. 兩個資料列會加入第二個資料表，然後合併到。Two rows are added to the second table, which is then merged into the . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataSet.Merge3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.Merge3 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataSet.Merge3 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.Merge3 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

use "target" to signify the current , and "source" to name the second (parameter) . 目標會如此命名是因為它是在其動作 （合併），就會發生的物件。The target is so named because it is the object upon which an action (the merge) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 為了方便說明方法中，我們使用 「 目標 」 來表示目前，並以命名第二個 （參數） 的 「 來源 」 。To facilitate explanation of the method, we use "target" to signify the current , and "source" to name the second (parameter) . 目標會如此命名是因為它是在其動作 （合併），就會發生的物件。The target is so named because it is the object upon which an action (the merge) occurs. 第二個稱為 「 來源 」，因為它所包含的資訊不會變更，但改為合併到目前。The second is called a "source" because the information it contains does not change, but instead is merged into the current . 當呼叫方法時，兩個結構描述物件進行比較，因為它是可能的結構描述可能已變更。When the method is called, the schemas of the two objects are compared because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed. 比方說，在企業對企業案例中，新的資料行可能有已加入 XML 結構描述由自動化程序。For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process. 如果來源包含結構描述項目 (新增物件)，在目標中遺漏，結構描述項目可以藉由設定新增到目標`missingSchemaAction`引數`MissingSchemaAction.Add`。If the source contains schema elements (added objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. 在此情況下，合併包含加入的結構描述和資料。In that case, the merged contains the added schema and data. 合併的結構描述之後, 便會合併資料。After merging schemas, the data is merged. 合併新的來源時到目標，任何來源的資料列與的值`Unchanged`， `Modified`，或`Deleted`與進行比對具有相同的主索引鍵值的目標資料列。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 來源的資料列`DataRowState`的值`Added`就會對應到新的來源資料列的相同主索引鍵值的新目標資料列。Source rows with a `DataRowState` value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. 合併期間，會停用條件約束。During a merge, constraints are disabled. 如果任何條件約束無法啟用合併，結尾產生，停用條件約束時，合併的資料都會保留下來。If any constraints cannot be enabled at the end of merge, a is generated and the merged data is retained while the constraints are disabled. 在此情況下，屬性設定為`false`，和所有資料列，而不會標示為錯誤。In this case, the property is set to `false`, and all rows that are invalid are marked in error. 必須先解決錯誤，然後再嘗試重設屬性設`true`。The errors must be resolved before attempting to reset the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列範例會建立簡單一個資料表、 兩個資料行，與 10 個資料列。The following example creates a simple with one table, two columns, and ten rows. 兩個值會變更，並加入一個資料列。Two values are changed, and one row is added. 使用建立的已變更的資料子集方法。A subset of the changed data is created using the method. 之後重新調整錯誤，變更結構描述的子集，加入新的資料行。After reconciling errors, a new column is added to the subset, changing the schema. 當方法呼叫`missingSchemaAction`設為`MissingSchemaAction.Add`，新的資料行加入原始物件的結構描述。When the method is called with the `missingSchemaAction` set to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`, the new column is added to the original object's schema. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataSet.Merge2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.Merge2 Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataSet.Merge2 Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataSet.Merge2 Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 讀取和寫入 XML 文件時，會使用屬性使用， ， ，或方法。The property is used when reading and writing an XML document into the using the , , , or methods. XML 文件的命名空間用來限定範圍的 XML 屬性和項目時讀取到。The namespace of an XML document is used to scope XML attributes and elements when read into a . 例如，如果包含結構描述已讀取的文件與命名空間"myCompany，"和嘗試具有不同的命名空間的文件中只能讀取資料，任何未對應到現有的結構描述的資料會被忽略。For example, if a contains a schema that was read from a document with the namespace "myCompany," and an attempt is made to read data only from a document with a different namespace, any data that does not correspond to the existing schema is ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會設定再呼叫方法。The following example sets the before calling the method. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法來讀取資料，或同時提供資料和結構描述讀入從 XML 文件，而方法會讀取結構描述。The method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a from an XML document, whereas the method reads only the schema. 若要讀取資料和結構描述，請使用其中一種`ReadXML`包含的多載`mode`參數，並將其值設定為`ReadSchema`。To read both data and schema, use one of the `ReadXML` overloads that includes the `mode` parameter, and set its value to `ReadSchema`. 請注意，這也適用於和方法，分別。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 要寫入 XML 資料，或結構描述和資料`DataSet`，使用`WriteXml`方法。To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataSet`, use the `WriteXml` method. 若要寫入的結構描述，使用`WriteXmlSchema`方法。To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果中的資料行型別將會擲回`DataRow`正在讀取或寫入實作並不會實作。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . 如果指定的內嵌結構描述，則內嵌結構描述用來擴充現有的關聯式結構載入資料前。If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data. 如果有任何衝突 （例如，相同的資料行定義為不同的資料型別相同資料表中） 會引發例外狀況。If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised. 如果未不指定任何內嵌結構描述，就會推斷，視需要透過關聯式結構擴充根據 XML 文件的結構。If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document. 如果無法推斷透過延伸架構才能公開的所有資料，則會引發例外狀況。If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised. > [!NOTE] > `DataSet`不會將 XML 項目關聯與其對應`DataColumn`或`DataTable`合法 XML 字元，例如 ("_") 中序列化的 XML 逸出。The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML. `DataSet`本身只會在 XML 項目名稱中不合法的 XML 字元的逸出，因此只能取用相同。The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same. 在 XML 項目名稱的合法字元會逸出，當處理時忽略此元素。When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing. 如果 XML 結構描述包含`targetNamespace`，可能不會讀取資料，並呼叫時，您可能會遇到例外狀況載入搭配包含非限定命名空間元素的 XML。If the XML Schema for a includes `targetNamespace`, data may not be read, and you may encounter exceptions when calling to load the with XML that contains elements with no qualifying namespace. 若要讀取未限定的項目，設定`elementFormDefault`等於"qualified"中的 XML 結構描述，如下列範例所示。To read unqualified elements, set `elementFormDefault` equal to "qualified" in your XML Schema, as the following example demonstrates. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果的結構描述您包含項目名稱相同，但相同的命名空間中的不同類型的例外狀況時擲回您嘗試讀取結構描述讀入使用藉由指定`XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`。If the schema for your contains elements of the same name, but different type, in the same namespace, an exception is thrown when you attempt to read the schema into the with by specifying `XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`. 如果您使用.NET Framework 1.0 版，則不會發生這個例外狀況。This exception does not occur if you are using .NET Framework version 1.0. ## Examples 下列範例會先建立一個簡單與其中一個，兩個資料行，以及十個資料列。The following example first creates a simple with one , two columns, and ten rows. 結構描述和資料會寫入磁碟，然後叫用方法。The schema and data are written to disk by invoking the method. 第二個建立和方法用來填入結構描述和資料。A second is created and the method is used to fill it with schema and data. or written to implements and does not implement . 如果指定的內嵌結構描述，則內嵌結構描述用來擴充現有的關聯式結構載入資料前。If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data. 如果有任何衝突 （例如，相同的資料行定義為不同的資料型別相同資料表中） 會引發例外狀況。If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised. 如果未不指定任何內嵌結構描述，就會推斷，視需要透過關聯式結構擴充根據 XML 文件的結構。If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document. 如果無法推斷透過延伸架構才能公開的所有資料，則會引發例外狀況。If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised. > [!NOTE] > `DataSet`不會將 XML 項目關聯與其對應`DataColumn`或`DataTable`合法 XML 字元，例如 ("_") 中序列化的 XML 逸出。The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML. `DataSet`本身只會在 XML 項目名稱中不合法的 XML 字元的逸出，因此只能取用相同。The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same. 在 XML 項目名稱的合法字元會逸出，當處理時忽略此元素。When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing. 如果 XML 結構描述包含`targetNamespace`，可能不會讀取資料，並呼叫時，您可能會遇到例外狀況載入搭配包含非限定命名空間元素的 XML。If the XML Schema for a includes `targetNamespace`, data may not be read, and you may encounter exceptions when calling to load the with XML that contains elements with no qualifying namespace. 若要讀取未限定的項目，設定`elementFormDefault`等於"qualified"中的 XML 結構描述如下列範例所示。To read unqualified elements, set `elementFormDefault` equal to "qualified" in your XML Schema as the following example demonstrates. ``` ``` > [!NOTE] > 如果的結構描述您包含項目名稱相同，但相同的命名空間中的不同類型的例外狀況時擲回您嘗試讀取結構描述讀入使用藉由指定`XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`。If the schema for your contains elements of the same name, but different type, in the same namespace, an exception is thrown when you attempt to read the schema into the with by specifying `XmlReadMode.ReadSchema`. 如果您使用.NET Framework 1.0 版，則不會發生這個例外狀況。This exception does not occur if you are using .NET Framework version 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A序列化其結構描述和執行個體的資料預設會在 Web 服務和遠端處理案例。A serializes its schema and instance data by default in Web services and remoting scenarios. 設定具型別的屬性`DataSet`到會導致序列化裝載要排除的結構描述資訊。Setting the property of a typed `DataSet` to causes schema information to be excluded from the serialization payload. 支援僅適用於具型別`DataSet`。 is supported only for a typed `DataSet`. 針對不具型別的`DataSet`這個屬性只能設定為。For an un-typed `DataSet` this property can only be set to . 只應在其中具類型的基礎結構描述資訊的情況下`DataTables`，`DataRelations`和`Constraints`未遭修改。 should only be used in cases where the schema information of the underlying typed `DataTables`, `DataRelations` and `Constraints` has not been modified. 如果修改已發生且完整的結構描述資訊應該序列化與。If modifications have occurred, complete schema information should be serialized with . 支援 2.0 版的.NET framework 或更新版本。 is supported in version 2.0 of the .NET Framework or later. 當設定，只有最上層的層級執行階段屬性存在於上會序列化。When is set, only the top level runtime properties present on the are serialized. 此外，它們會序列化才發生不同的預設值。In addition, they are serialized only if they happen to be different from the default values. 沒有任何`Tables`，`Relations`或`Constraints`會序列化。None of the `Tables`, `Relations` or `Constraints` are serialized. 包含序列化的執行階段屬性， ， ， ， ，和。The serialized runtime properties include , , , , , and . 這些屬性會序列化以確定會保留整體的執行階段資料的完整性。These properties are serialized to make sure that overall runtime data integrity is preserved.
